data.message:
Hello, I am trying to report a problem following the steps outlined here: https://www.facebook.com/help/186570224871049?sf23163364=1&sf32811175=1 But, I don't see the report a problem link as an option. Is there another way I can report a problem because I can't figure it out. 

The problem I am having is on of my pages , none of my posts are showing up on the home page for me personally (I can if I view them as a visitor or go to posts. Shouldn't I be able to see all the posts on the home page (I can see them on other pages I manage).?  I sent a message through this page and haven't heard a response.

replies.message: Hey Erin. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2bgDM8m. Thanks. -Jordan
just a quick note to Erin, F.B. has millions of users and at a certain time of day things do slow dn. a tad..but u get ur posts just not lickity split!  just a little patience....yeah,yeah....
Facebook par un travail de réseau pour animer et coordonner
